books.description: How Homo sapiens became Earth’s dominant species. Read by Derek Perkins. 15 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.

books.author: Lisa Taddeo
books.description: The inequality of female desire is explored through the sex lives of a homemaker, a high school student and a restauranteur. Read by Tara Lynne Barr, Marin Ireland, Mena Suvari and the author. 11 hours, 24 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THREE WOMEN

books.author: Tim Alberta
books.description: Politico Magazine’s chief political correspondent describes a decade-long civil war inside the G.O.P. and Donald Trump’s concurrent ascension. Read by Jason Culp. 26 hours, 23 minutes unabridged.

books.description: An argument for how generalists excel more than specialists. Read by Will Damron. 10 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
